subject: Soccer
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A view of the tournament as Switzerland defeats Spain, 1-0, and records the tournament’s first major upset. The host nation, South Africa, also lost, 3-0.
snippet: A view of the tournament as Switzerland defeats Spain, 1-0, and records the tournament’s first major upset. The host nation, South Africa, also lost, 3-0.
